an5.151:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with five qualities is unable to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities even when listening to the true teaching.
an5.151:4.3: They disparage the talk, the speaker, or themselves. They listen with distracted and scattered mind. They focus in the wrong way.
an5.151:4.4: Someone with these five qualities is unable to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities, even when listening to the true teaching.
an5.151:5.1: Someone with five qualities is able to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities when listening to the true teaching.
an5.151:5.3: They don’t disparage the talk, the speaker, or themselves. They listen with undistracted and unified mind. They focus in the right way.
an5.151:5.4: Someone with these five qualities is able to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities when listening to the true teaching.”
